description: This header file declares internal API functions for an ANSC Byte Array object, including methods for managing the size, elements, and buffers of the byte array object.

methods.name: AnscByteArrayGetSize
methods.description: Retrieves the size of the byte array object.

methods.name: AnscByteArraySetSize
methods.description: Sets a new size for the byte array, possibly enlarging or shrinking it.

methods.name: AnscByteArrayRemoveAll
methods.description: Removes all elements from the byte array.

methods.name: AnscByteArrayGetAt
methods.description: Returns the data at a specific index in the byte array.

methods.name: AnscByteArraySetAt
methods.description: Sets the data at a specific index in the byte array.

methods.name: AnscByteArrayInsertAt
methods.description: Inserts data at a specific index, shifting subsequent elements.

methods.name: AnscByteArrayRemoveAt
methods.description: Removes a number of elements starting at a specific index.

methods.name: AnscByteArrayAdd
methods.description: Adds a new element to the end of the byte array.

methods.name: AnscByteArrayEnlargeStorage
methods.description: Enlarges the internal storage to hold more data.

methods.name: AnscByteArrayFind
methods.description: Finds the index of a specified data element.

methods.name: AnscByteArrayGetBuffer
methods.description: Returns a buffer handle at a given index.

methods.name: AnscByteArraySetBuffer
methods.description: Sets a buffer for the byte array, possibly using an external or foreign buffer.
